text: (Muhammad) sira nyritakna bab dina Qiyamat, nalikane Allah angempalake para wong kafir dalah barang - barang kang disembah dening wong - wong kafir mau (yaiku brahala). Allah banur andangu, "He brahala, apa sira kang nasarake kawulaningsun samono iku, utawa apa kawulaningsun padha nasar saka dalan kang bener
